subject: MCM Design Refresh Complete — Please Validate
body:
All 14 design refresh tasks are done and pushed to master. Please run the full validation:

1. npx playwright test — all existing e2e tests still pass
2. New checks for each task:
   - exam.html no-param → picker renders 'Pick Your Challenge' (not Loading)
   - computedStyle.fontFamily on body/h1/p → no Times New Roman
   - Button count per tier per page (ONE red per screen)
   - Arena toggle persists across navigation (mcm-arena-mode localStorage)
   - Archive pages: inputs disabled (pointer-events:none), submit hidden, banner visible
   - Print preview: no split questions, generous writing space, page margins
   - Blue default borders on question cards (not red/gradient)
   - Warm section headers with emoji (no ALL CAPS)
   - Coach voice empty states
   - Type scale: all font-sizes use var(--text-*) tokens

Write results to FA inbox when done.
